---
title: "Styles of Data Analysis"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
data(iris)
flowers <- subset(iris, Species == "setosa")
# 1 by 4 layout
par(mfrow = c(1, 4))
attach(flowers)
hist(Sepal.Length, breaks = 3.5 + (0:0.5) * 10, ylim = c(0, 20), xlab = "Sepal length", main = "A: breaks at odomdoa")
hist(Sepal.Length, breaks = 3.5 + (0:0.75) * 10, ylim = c(0, 20), xlab = "Sepal length", main = "A: breaks at odomdoa")
dens <- density(Sepal.Length)
xlim <- range(dens$x)
ylim <- range(dens$y)
hist(Sepal.Length,  breaks = 3.5 + (0:0.5) * 10, probability = TRUE, xlim = xlim, ylim = ylim, xlab = "copiar mierdas varias", main = "mas mierdas")
lines(dens)
hist(Sepal.Length,  breaks = 3.5 + (0:0.75) * 10, probability = TRUE, xlim = xlim, ylim = ylim, xlab = "copiar mierdas varias", main = "mas mierdas")
lines(dens)
par(mfrow = c(1, 1)); detach(flowers)
```
